title: Brex 39.6.3
text:
Brex 39.6.3
Brex– Freeware – iOS
out of 3258 votes
Brex offers a comprehensive range of services for businesses, including corporate cards, expense management, reimbursements, business accounts, and travel solutions. These offerings are all conveniently accessible through a unified, global platform.
The Brex mobile app provides users with seamless and efficient access to their Brex account and card. With the app, you can effortlessly make purchases, check spending limits and policies, submit expenses, request or approve reimbursements, send payments worldwide, and more.
Download the free Brex app to enjoy the following benefits:
- Conveniently use your card without the need for your wallet
- Easily view and adhere to your expense policy guidelines
- Efficiently manage any pending tasks through an intuitive inbox
- Add missing receipts, with many being automatically added
- Effortlessly book and manage business travel with a wide global inventory
- Send and receive ACH and wire payments from anywhere
- Securely store funds in an FDIC-insured business account
- Schedule or cancel recurring or one-time payments with ease
- Enjoy round-the-clock live support available from any location
In addition to these features, Brex accounts seamlessly integrate with popular existing tools such as QuickBooks, NetSuite, Workday, Coupa, Gusto, WhatsApp, and Slack. This integration helps streamline workflows and facilitates faster closing of financial books for businesses.
To start benefiting from Brex's services, either download the app or visit brex.com.
Overview
Brex is a Freeware software in the category Business developed by
Brex.
The latest version of Brex is 39.6.3, released on 01/06/2024. It was initially added to our database on 10/01/2023.

Users of Brex gave it a rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
